title: SRA on being satisfied that it is necessary to do so, or when directed by the State Govt
clause_text: SRA on being satisfied that it is necessary to do so, or when directed by the State Govt., shall de-notify the Slum Rehabilitation Area.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: SRA on being satisfied that it is necessary to do so, or when directed by the State Govt., shall de-notify the Slum Rehabilitation Area.
